original_title: En el cielo me dejas caer
overview: Anna travels to Santiago after many years, convinced by her brother to leave their mother’s ashes in the imposing rocks at Las Docas in Valparaíso, where their father lives in a faraway cabin. A significant reunion for this deteriorated family will be tainted by alcohol, childhood memories and love. Anna and her father will revive the demon that destroyed what once was their family.
title: In the Sky You Let Me Fall
